info.author: Charles Moad
info.description:
GLEWpy aims to bring advanced OpenGL extensions to Python. This will allow the
Python OpenGL developer to use features such as fragment and vertex shaders and
image processing on the GPU. It serves as a compliment to PyOpenGL and toolkits
such as GLUT and SDL (pygame).
info.name: glewpy
info.html_description: GLEWpy aims to bring advanced OpenGL extensions to Python. This will allow the Python OpenGL developer to use features such as fragment and vertex shaders and image processing on the GPU. It serves as a compliment to PyOpenGL and toolkits such as GLUT and SDL (pygame).
